item.title: Contact
item.description: Hours listed are general hours of availability. Home visits and demonstrations can be scheduled outside of these hours. Day Opening Hours Monday 8:30am - 6:00pm Tuesday 8:30am - 6:00pm Wednesday 8:30am - 6:00pm Thursday 8:30am - 6:00pm Friday 8:30am - 6:00pm Saturday 10:am - 6:00pm Sunday Closed

item.title: About
item.description: Back in 1989 Harold Schoettler founded an exciting new company dedicated to developing and marketing consumer home environmental products of the highest quality. SREC designs and manufacturers its products in Huntington Beach California, and distributes them to many different countries throughout the world. Schoettler Research and Engineering Corp. Designer and Maker of the Patriot Hybrid System Air Lion, the midwest regional distributor of the Patriot System.
